text: STALKER
title: Stalker

text: ''What was it?A meteorite?
title: Stalker

text: A visit of inhabitantsof the cosmic abyss?
title: Stalker

text: One way or another,our small country
title: Stalker

text: has seen the birth of a miracle -the Zone.
title: Stalker

text: We immediately sent troops there.
title: Stalker

text: They haven't come back.
title: Stalker

text: Then we surrounded the Zonewith police cordons...
title: Stalker

text: Perhaps, that was the right thing todo. Though, I don't know...''
title: Stalker

text: From an interview with Nobel Prizewinner, Professor Wallace.
title: Stalker

text: Why did you take my watch?
title: Stalker

text: Where are you going, I'm asking you?
title: Stalker

text: You gave me your wordand I believed you.
title: Stalker

text: All right, you're not thinking aboutyourself, but what about us?
title: Stalker

text: Did you think about your child?
title: Stalker

text: She's just getting used to you,and you start it again!
title: Stalker

text: You've made an old woman of me.You've ruined my life.
title: Stalker

text: Not so loud, you'll wake upMonkey.
title: Stalker

text: I can't wait for you forever.I'm going to die!
title: Stalker

text: You wanted to start working!
title: Stalker

text: You've been promiseda normal human work!
title: Stalker

text: I'll be back soon.
title: Stalker

text: You'll be back to prison!
title: Stalker

text: Though this time you'll getten years, not five!
title: Stalker

text: And for ten years you will haveneither your Zone, nor anything!
title: Stalker

text: And I'll be dead in the meantime.
title: Stalker

text: Oh God, for me it's prisoneverywhere!
title: Stalker

text: - Let me go!- No!
title: Stalker

text: Let go, I said!
title: Stalker

text: Go!And may you rot there!
title: Stalker

text: Be damned the daywhen I met you, bastard!
title: Stalker

text: God himseIf has cursed youby giving you this child!
title: Stalker

text: And me too, because of you, jerk!
title: Stalker

text: My dear,our world is hopelessly boring.
title: Stalker

text: Therefore, there can be no telepathy,or apparitions, or flying saucers,
title: Stalker

text: nothing like that.
title: Stalker

text: The world is ruled by cast-iron laws,and it's insufferably boring.
title: Stalker

text: Alas, those laws are never violated.
title: Stalker

text: They don't know how to be violated.
title: Stalker

text: So don't even hope for a UFO,that would have been too interesting.
title: Stalker

text: And how about the Bermuda Triangle?You're not going to deny...
title: Stalker

text: I am. There is no Bermuda Triangle.
title: Stalker

text: There's only Triangle ABC that equalsTriangle A-prim, B-prim, C-prim.
title: Stalker

text: Do you feel the boredomcontained in this assertion?
title: Stalker

text: To live in the Middle Ages wasinteresting.
title: Stalker

text: Every home had its house-spirit,and every church had its God.
title: Stalker

text: People were young!Now every fourth is an old person.
title: Stalker

text: It's so boring, my angel.
title: Stalker

text: But you said that the Zone
title: Stalker

text: was the product of a superiorcivilization...
title: Stalker

text: It must be boring, too,all those laws, triangles,
title: Stalker

text: and no house spirits,and no God, that's for certain.
title: Stalker

text: Because if God is alsoa triangle,
title: Stalker

text: then I don't know what to think.
title: Stalker

text: It's for me! Great!
title: Stalker

text: Goodbye, my dear friend.
title: Stalker

text: This lady was so kind as to agreeto go with us to the Zone.
title: Stalker

text: She's a very courageous woman.Her name is...
title: Stalker

text: I beg your pardon, your name is..?
title: Stalker

text: Are you really a stalker?
title: Stalker

text: Wait... I'll explain everything.
title: Stalker

text: Go...
title: Stalker

text: What a cretin!
title: Stalker

text: You did get drunk after all.
title: Stalker

text: Me? What do you mean?
title: Stalker

text: I had a drink, like one halfof the population does.
title: Stalker

text: The other haIf gets drunk.Including women and children.
title: Stalker

text: I just had a drink though.
title: Stalker

text: Damn it, what a mess here.
title: Stalker

text: Go on, drink. We've got time.
title: Stalker

text: How about a glass for the road?
title: Stalker

text: What do you think?
title: Stalker

text: Take it away.
title: Stalker

text: I see. Dry law.Alcoholism is a scourge of mankind.
title: Stalker

text: All right, we'll drink beer.
title: Stalker

text: Is he with us?
title: Stalker

text: Never mind, he'll sober up.He needs to go there, too.
title: Stalker

text: Are you really a professor?
title: Stalker

text: If you don't mind.
title: Stalker

text: Then let me introduce myself.My name is...
title: Stalker

text: Your name is Writer.
title: Stalker

text: Well. And what is my name?
title: Stalker

text: Yours? Professor.
title: Stalker

text: I see. I'm a writer,
title: Stalker

text: so, naturally, everyone calls meWriter for some reason.
title: Stalker

text: - And what do you write about?- About the readers.
title: Stalker

text: Obviously, there's nothing elseone should write about.
title: Stalker

text: One should write about nothing at all.
title: Stalker

text: And what are you? A chemist?
title: Stalker

text: A physicist rather.
title: Stalker

text: That must be boring, too.Searching for the truth.
title: Stalker

text: It's hiding and you keep searchingfor it.
title: Stalker

text: You dig in one place - eureka!The nucleus is made of protons.
title: Stalker

text: You dig in another - great!
title: Stalker

text: Triangle ABC equalsTriangle A-prim, B-prim, C-prim.
title: Stalker

text: With me it's quite different.
title: Stalker

text: While I am digging for the truth,so much happens to it
title: Stalker

text: that instead of discovering the truth
title: Stalker

text: I dig up a heap of, pardon...I'd better not name it.
title: Stalker

text: You're lucky!
title: Stalker

text: But imagine some antique potdisplayed in a museum.
title: Stalker

text: It was used at its timeas a receptacle of food leftovers,
title: Stalker

text: but now it's an object ofuniversal admiration
title: Stalker

text: for its laconic patternand unique form.
title: Stalker

text: Everyone goes oh! and ah!
title: Stalker

text: And suddenly it turns outthat it's not antique at all,
title: Stalker

text: that some joker has palmed it offon the archeologists
title: Stalker

text: just for fun.
title: Stalker

text: Strange as it may seem, the admirationdies off. Those connoisseurs...
title: Stalker

text: Is it what you think aboutall the time?
title: Stalker

text: God forbid!
title: Stalker

text: In fact, I don't think much.It's not good for me.
title: Stalker

text: It's impossible to write, thinkingall the time of success or failure.
title: Stalker

text: Naturlich!  But if no one is goingto read me in one hundred years,
title: Stalker

text: why the hell should I write at all?
title: Stalker

text: Tell me, Professor, why did you letyourseIf be mixed up in all this?
title: Stalker

text: What do you need the Zone for?
title: Stalker

text: I'm a scientist in some sense.
title: Stalker

text: But what do you need it for?
title: Stalker

text: You're an in writer.
title: Stalker

text: Women must be running after youin flocks.
title: Stalker

text: My inspiration has been lost,Professor. I go begging for it.
title: Stalker

text: Have you been used up?
title: Stalker

text: What?Yes, I guess, in a way.
title: Stalker

text: Do you hear it? Our train.
title: Stalker

text: - Have you taken the roof off the car?- Yes, I have.
title: Stalker

text: Luger!... If I don't come back,call on my wife.
title: Stalker

text: Damn it, I forgot to buy cigarettes.
title: Stalker

text: Don't go back.
title: Stalker

text: - Why?- You must not.
title: Stalker

text: - You're all like this.- Like what?
title: Stalker

text: Believing such nonsense.
title: Stalker

text: Well, I'd better leave it for a rainyday.
title: Stalker

text: Are you really a scientist?
title: Stalker

text: Down!
title: Stalker

text: Don't move!
title: Stalker

text: Go and look, is there anyone there?
title: Stalker

text: Move it, for God's sake!
title: Stalker

text: There's no one there.
title: Stalker

text: Go to the other exit.
title: Stalker

text: Where on earth did you look, Writer?
title: Stalker

text: - You didn't forget the jerry can?- No. It's full.
title: Stalker

text: Everything I told you before...
title: Stalker

text: ...is a lie.I don't give a damn about inspiration.
title: Stalker

text: How would I knowthe right word for what I want?
title: Stalker

text: How would I know that actuallyI don't want what I want?
title: Stalker

text: Or that I actually don't wantwhat I don't want?
title: Stalker

text: They are elusive things:
title: Stalker

text: the moment we name them,their meaning disappears,
title: Stalker

text: melts, dissolveslike a jellyfish in the sun.
title: Stalker

text: My conscience wants vegetarianismto win over the world.
title: Stalker

text: And my subconscious is yearningfor a piece of juicy meat.
title: Stalker

text: But what do I want?
title: Stalker

text: World domination.
title: Stalker

text: Quiet!
title: Stalker

text: Why a diesel locomotive in the Zone?
title: Stalker

text: It services the outpost.It won't go any farther.
title: Stalker

text: They don't like going there.
title: Stalker

text: Take your places!Everybody here?
title: Stalker

text: The guards have arrived.Tell them to turn the TV off.
title: Stalker

text: Hurry!
title: Stalker

text: Go look if there's a trolleyon the tracks.
title: Stalker

text: What trolley?
title: Stalker

text: Go back, I'll do it.
title: Stalker

text: The jerry can!
title: Stalker

text: Give it to me!
title: Stalker

text: Get rid of your knapsack,it's hampering you.
title: Stalker

text: You may travel light, if you wish,as if going for a stroll.
title: Stalker

text: If someone gets hit,don't shout or rush about.
title: Stalker

text: If they see you, they'll kill you.
title: Stalker

text: When everything settles down,crawl back to the outpost.
title: Stalker

text: They'll pick you up in the morning.
title: Stalker

text: Can they catch up with us?
title: Stalker

text: They fear it like the plague.
title: Stalker

text: Fear what?
title: Stalker

text: Here we are... home, at last.
title: Stalker

text: How quiet it is.
title: Stalker

text: This is the quietest place inthe world. You'll see for yourselves.
title: Stalker

text: So beautiful here.Not a single soul here.
title: Stalker

text: What about us?
title: Stalker

text: Three men can't spoil the placein one day.
title: Stalker

text: Why? They can.
title: Stalker

text: It's strange that flowersdon't smell. Or have I...
title: Stalker

text: Do you feel anything?
title: Stalker

text: I feel the stench of the bog.
title: Stalker

text: No, that's the river.There's a river here.
title: Stalker

text: There was a flower-bed nearby,but Porcupine had trampled it down.
title: Stalker

text: The smell lingeredfor many years though.
title: Stalker

text: Why did he do it?
title: Stalker

text: I don't know.
title: Stalker

text: I asked him why, too.
title: Stalker

text: And he said:"You'll understand later."
title: Stalker

text: I think he just came to hate the Zone.
title: Stalker

text: Porcupine, that's his name?
title: Stalker

text: A nickname, like yours.
title: Stalker

text: He had been taking people to the Zonefor years, and no one could stop him.
title: Stalker

text: He was my teacher.He opened my eyes.
title: Stalker

text: He was called Teacher then,not Porcupine.
title: Stalker

text: Then something happened to him,something broke in him.
title: Stalker

text: Though I thinkhe was punished.
title: Stalker

text: Will you help me? Tie those stripsof bandage to the nuts.
title: Stalker

text: And I... will go for a walk.
title: Stalker

text: I need to do something...
title: Stalker

text: Don't go anywhere.
title: Stalker

text: Where's he going?
title: Stalker

text: He wants to be alone, I guess.
title: Stalker

text: Why? Even with the three of ustogether, I feel weird.
title: Stalker

text: A date with the Zone.He's a stalker.
title: Stalker

text: And what does that mean?
title: Stalker

text: You see, being a stalkeris some sort of calling.
title: Stalker

text: - I thought he'd be different.- Like what?
title: Stalker

text: Well, you know, the Leather Stockings,Chingachgook sort of things...
title: Stalker

text: His background is even more frightful.
title: Stalker

text: Several times in prison,then he was harmed here.
title: Stalker

text: He has a mutant daughter,a victim of the Zone as they call it.
title: Stalker

text: They say she's got no legs.
title: Stalker

text: And what about this Porcupine?
title: Stalker

text: What does it mean, was punished ?
title: Stalker

text: Or was it just a figure of speech?
title: Stalker

text: One day Porcupine returned from here
title: Stalker

text: and got rich overnight.
title: Stalker

text: Fabulously rich.
title: Stalker

text: You call it punishment?
title: Stalker

text: A week later he hanged himself.
title: Stalker

text: Why?
title: Stalker

text: Quiet!
title: Stalker

text: What was that?
title: Stalker

text: Presumably a meteorite fell downhere about twenty years ago.
title: Stalker

text: It had burned down the settlement.
title: Stalker

text: They searched for this meteorite,but never found it, of course.
title: Stalker

text: Why ''of course''?
title: Stalker

text: Then people began disappearing here.
title: Stalker

text: They came here and never returned.
title: Stalker

text: So it was concluded...
title: Stalker

text: that this meteoritewas not really a meteorite.
title: Stalker

text: At first...
title: Stalker

text: they circled the place with barbedwire to scare off the inquisitive.
title: Stalker

text: All this gave rise to rumoursthat there's a place in the Zone...
title: Stalker

text: where wishes come true.
title: Stalker

text: Naturally, they began to guardthe Zone like the apple of their eye.
title: Stalker

text: Who knows what kind of wishsomeone might cherish.
title: Stalker

text: What was it if not a meteorite?
title: Stalker

text: I told you, no one knows.
title: Stalker

text: And what do you think?
title: Stalker

text: Nothing.Or anything.
title: Stalker

text: A message to mankind,as one of my colleagues says.
title: Stalker

text: Or a gift.
title: Stalker

text: Some gift.
title: Stalker

text: Why on earth would they do it?
title: Stalker

text: To make us happy.
title: Stalker

text: The flowers are blooming again,but they don't smell for some reason.
title: Stalker

text: Sorry for leaving you two here,but it was too early to go anyway.
title: Stalker

text: Did you hear it?
title: Stalker

text: Maybe someone lives here?
title: Stalker

text: Who?
title: Stalker

text: You told me yourself
title: Stalker

text: about some tourists camped herewhen the Zone originated.
title: Stalker

text: There's no one in the Zone andthere can't be.
title: Stalker

text: Well, it's time.
title: Stalker

text: How are we going to return?
title: Stalker

text: - They don't return here.- What do you mean?
title: Stalker

text: We'll go as we agreed.
title: Stalker

text: I'll show the direction.
title: Stalker

text: Any deviation from it is dangerous.
title: Stalker

text: The first landmark is that last pole.
title: Stalker

text: You go first, Professor.
title: Stalker

text: Now you.
title: Stalker

text: Try to follow in his footsteps.
title: Stalker

text: Oh, my God! And where are...
title: Stalker

text: Did they remain here like that?Those people?
title: Stalker

text: Who knows.
title: Stalker

text: I remember them packing at the station,getting ready to come here.
title: Stalker

text: I was just a boy.
title: Stalker

text: We all thought thenthat somebody wanted to conquer us.
title: Stalker

text: You first, Professor.
title: Stalker

text: Now you, Writer.
title: Stalker

text: Your room is over there.We'll go this way.
title: Stalker

text: Why were you hiking up the price?It's so close at hand.
title: Stalker

text: Yes, but the handhas to be very long.
title: Stalker

text: We don't have such a hand.
title: Stalker

text: Don't! Leave it alone!
title: Stalker

text: Don't touch it!
title: Stalker

text: Don't touch it, I said!
title: Stalker

text: Are you crazy?What's the matter with you?
title: Stalker

text: It's not the placefor leisurely strolls.
title: Stalker

text: The Zone wants to be respected.Otherwise it will punish.
title: Stalker

text: Don't you ever try it again...Have you no tongue or what?
title: Stalker

text: I warned you, didn't I?
title: Stalker

text: Are we to go there?
title: Stalker

text: Yes. Up, enter itand to the left.
title: Stalker

text: Only we are not going this way.We'll go around.
title: Stalker

text: Why?
title: Stalker

text: People don't go this way.
title: Stalker

text: In the Zone, the longer the way,the less is the risk.
title: Stalker

text: And to go straight ahead is fatal?
title: Stalker

text: He told you it's dangerous.
title: Stalker

text: - And making a detour's not dangerous?- It is. But they don't go this way.
title: Stalker

text: What do I care that they don't?What if I take a chance...
title: Stalker

text: Listen, what's the matter with you...
title: Stalker

text: To go all the way around!When everything's so close.
title: Stalker

text: Here a risk, there a risk.What the hell !
title: Stalker

text: You're being very flippantabout this.
title: Stalker

text: I'm fed up withall those nuts and bandages.
title: Stalker

text: You may do as you wish,but I'm going.
title: Stalker

text: - You're insane.- It's YOU who are...
title: Stalker

text: May I?
title: Stalker

text: The wind is coming up...
title: Stalker

text: Can you feel it? The grass...
title: Stalker

text: All the more so.
title: Stalker

text: What do you mean?
title: Stalker

text: Wait!
title: Stalker

text: Keep your hands off!
title: Stalker

text: Professor be my witness,I didn't sent you there.
title: Stalker

text: You go of your own will.
title: Stalker

text: Of my own will. What else?
title: Stalker

text: Nothing. Go.
title: Stalker

text: God help you to be lucky.
title: Stalker

text: Listen!
title: Stalker

text: Should you notice something,
title: Stalker

text: or just feel something,
title: Stalker

text: go back at once, or...
title: Stalker

text: Just don't throw iron poles at me.
title: Stalker

text: Stop! Don't move!
title: Stalker

text: - Why did you do it?- Why did I do what?
title: Stalker

text: - Why did you stop him?- I thought it was you...
title: Stalker

text: What's up?Why did you stop me?
title: Stalker

text: I didn't stop you.
title: Stalker

text: Who did it then? You?
title: Stalker

text: Who the hell knows...
title: Stalker

text: You're smart, Mister Shakespeare.
title: Stalker

text: To go straight ahead is scary,to go back is embarrassing.
title: Stalker

text: So you gave yourseIf a command.Fear has made you come to your senses.
title: Stalker

text: - What?- Stop it.
title: Stalker

text: - Why have you emptied the bottle?- Stop it, I said!
title: Stalker

text: The Zone is a very complicated system...
title: Stalker

text: ...of traps,and they're all deadly.
title: Stalker

text: I don't know what's going on herein the absence of people,
title: Stalker

text: but the moment someone shows up,everything comes into motion.
title: Stalker

text: Old traps disappearand new ones emerge.
title: Stalker

text: Safe spotsbecome impassable.
title: Stalker

text: Now your path is easy,now it's hopelessly involved.
title: Stalker

text: That's the Zone.
title: Stalker

text: It may even seem capricious.
title: Stalker

text: But it is what we've made itwith our condition.
title: Stalker

text: It happened that peoplehad to stop halfway, and go back.
title: Stalker

text: Some of them even diedon the very threshold of the room.
title: Stalker

text: But everything that's going on heredepends not on the Zone, but on us!
title: Stalker

text: So it lets the good ones passand kills the bad ones?
title: Stalker

text: I don't know.
title: Stalker

text: I think,it lets those pass who...
title: Stalker

text: have lost all hope.
title: Stalker

text: Not good or bad,but wretched people.
title: Stalker

text: But even the most wretched will dieif they don't know how to behave.
title: Stalker

text: You have been lucky,it just warned you.
title: Stalker

text: I guess I'll wait for you here;
title: Stalker

text: until you come back,made happy.
title: Stalker

text: It's impossible!
title: Stalker

text: I've got sandwiches, a thermos...
title: Stalker

text: You won't last even an hour herewithout me.
title: Stalker

text: Besides, one doesn't return herethe way one comes.
title: Stalker

text: Anyway, I would prefer...
title: Stalker

text: Then we're going back right away.
title: Stalker

text: I'll return your moneyminus a certain sum
title: Stalker

text: for the trouble, so to speak...
title: Stalker

text: Have you come to your senses,Professor?
title: Stalker

text: All right. Go on, throw your nut.
title: Stalker

text:   Part Two  
title: Stalker

text: STALKER
title: Stalker

text: Where are you?Come here!
title: Stalker

text: Are you tired?
title: Stalker

text: Oh, God!
title: Stalker

text: Judging by his tone, he's going `to start sermonizing again.
title: Stalker

text: Let everything that's been plannedcome true.
title: Stalker

text: Let them believe.
title: Stalker

text: And let them have a laughat their passions.
title: Stalker

text: Because what they call passionactually is not some emotional energy,
title: Stalker

text: but just the friction betweentheir souls and the outside world.
title: Stalker

text: And most important,let them believe in themselves
title: Stalker

text: let them be helpless like children,
title: Stalker

text: because weakness is a great thing,and strength is nothing.
title: Stalker

text: When a man is just born,he is weak and flexible,
title: Stalker

text: when he dies,he is hard and insensitive.
title: Stalker

text: When a tree is growing,it's tender and pliant,
title: Stalker

text: but when it's dry and hard,it dies.
title: Stalker

text: Hardness and strengthare death's companions.
title: Stalker

text: Pliancy and weakness are expressionsof the freshness of being.
title: Stalker

text: Because what has hardenedwill never win.
title: Stalker

text: Come here!We're progressing well.
title: Stalker

text: Soon we'll come to a dry tunnel,after that it will get easier.
title: Stalker

text: Knock on wood.
title: Stalker

text: - Are we on our way already?- Of course. Why?
title: Stalker

text: I thought you just wantedto show us something.
title: Stalker

text: - What about my knapsack?- What about it?
title: Stalker

text: I left it there.I didn't know we were going.
title: Stalker

text: - There's nothing we can do about it.- No, we have to go back.
title: Stalker

text: - It's impossible!- I can't do without my knapsack!
title: Stalker

text: Can't you understand that no one herehas ever come back the same way?
title: Stalker

text: Forget about your knapsack.What have you got there, diamonds?
title: Stalker

text: The room will give youanything you want.
title: Stalker

text: Really. It will drown youin knapsacks.
title: Stalker

text: How far is it, this room?
title: Stalker

text: If you go straight, about 200 meters,but there's no going straight here.
title: Stalker

text: Let's go.
title: Stalker

text: Give up your empiricism, Professor.Miracles are outside empiricism.
title: Stalker

text: Remember how St. Peterwas nearly drowned?
title: Stalker

text: Go, Writer.
title: Stalker

text: Go where?
title: Stalker

text: Up these stairs.
title: Stalker

text: Professor, where are you?
title: Stalker

text: Here is the dry tunnel!
title: Stalker

text: You call it dry?
title: Stalker

text: This is a local joke.Normally one has to swim here.
title: Stalker

text: Wait, where's Professor?
title: Stalker

text: - What?- Professor has disappeared!
title: Stalker

text: How could it happen?He was following you all the way.
title: Stalker

text: He probably lagged behind andlost his way.
title: Stalker

text: No, he didn't lose his way!He must've gone for the knapsack!
title: Stalker

text: He won't be able to make it now.
title: Stalker

text: Shall we wait for him?
title: Stalker

text: We can't. Things change hereevery minute. We'll have to go.
title: Stalker

text: Look! What is it? How could it be?
title: Stalker

text: - I already explained.- What did you explain?
title: Stalker

text: It's the Zone, don't you understand?Let's go, quick. It's...
title: Stalker

text: There he is!
title: Stalker

text: I'm certainly grateful to youthat you... but...
title: Stalker

text: How did you get here?
title: Stalker

text: Mostly I had to crawl up hereon my fours.
title: Stalker

text: Incredible.How did you manage to overtake us?
title: Stalker

text: What do you mean, ''overtake''?I came back here for the knapsack.
title: Stalker

text: And how has our nut gotten here?
title: Stalker

text: Oh, my God, that's...the trap!
title: Stalker

text: Porcupine put this nut hereon purpose.
title: Stalker

text: How could the Zone let us through?
title: Stalker

text: Oh God, I'm not goingto take one more step until...
title: Stalker

text: I don't like it.
title: Stalker

text: That's it! We rest!
title: Stalker

text: But keep off this nut,just in case.
title: Stalker

text: Sorry, but I thought thatProfessor won't be able to make it.
title: Stalker

text: You see, I...
title: Stalker

text: I never know beforehand what kindof people I'm taking with me.
title: Stalker

text: Everything gets clear only here,when it's too late.
title: Stalker

text: What's important is that Professor'sbag with his underwear is safe.
title: Stalker

text: Don't stick your nose in someone'sunderwear if you don't understand it.
title: Stalker

text: What is there to understand?Binomial theorem?
title: Stalker

text: Some psychological abysses!
title: Stalker

text: You have a bad reputationat your institute.
title: Stalker

text: They don't give you moneyfor an expedition.
title: Stalker

text: So you decide to pack a knapsackfull of manometers and other shit...
title: Stalker

text: penetrate the Zone illegally...
title: Stalker

text: and put all these miraclesto an algebra test.
title: Stalker

text: No one in the worldhas ever heard of the Zone.
title: Stalker

text: So we'll work a sure sensation!
title: Stalker

text: The television, fans ravingand bringing laurel wreaths.
title: Stalker

text: Here our Professor appears,all in white,
title: Stalker

text: and declares:''Mene-mene, tekel, uprasin.''
title: Stalker

text: Everyone gaping
title: Stalker

text: and shouting:''He deserves a Nobel Prize!''
title: Stalker

text: You lousy scribbler,a homespun psychoanalyst.
title: Stalker

text: You're only good for painting wallsin public toilets, you blabbermouth.
title: Stalker

text: No good. Too sluggish.
title: Stalker

text: You don't know how to do it.
title: Stalker

text: All right. I'm going to geta Nobel Prize.
title: Stalker

text: And what are you after?Want to bless mankind
title: Stalker

text: with the pearlsof your purchased inspiration?
title: Stalker

text: I don't care a damn about mankind.Of all your mankind
title: Stalker

text: I'm interestedonly in one man - myself.
title: Stalker

text: Whether I'm worth anythingor I'm just shit like others.
title: Stalker

text: And if you find outthat you're really...
title: Stalker

text: You know, Mr. Einstein,I have no wish to argue with you.
title: Stalker

text: Truth is born of argument,damn it!
title: Stalker

text: Listen, Chingachgook...
title: Stalker

text: You've brought heremany people.
title: Stalker

text: Not as many as I would like.
title: Stalker

text: That's not the point. Why did theycome here? What did they want?
title: Stalker

text: Happiness, I guess.
title: Stalker

text: Yes, but what kind of happiness?
title: Stalker

text: People don't like to speak abouttheir innermost feelings.
title: Stalker

text: And it's neither yoursnor my business.
title: Stalker

text: In any case, you've been lucky.
title: Stalker

text: As for me, I haven't seenone happy man in my life.
title: Stalker

text: Me neither.
title: Stalker

text: They return from the roomand I lead them back,
title: Stalker

text: and we never see each other again.
title: Stalker

text: It's not that wishes come trueimmediately.
title: Stalker

text: Have you ever wishedto use this room yourself?
title: Stalker

text: I'm fine as I am.
title: Stalker

text: Listen, Professor.
title: Stalker

text: Speaking of the purchased inspiration.
title: Stalker

text: Let's imagine that I enter this room
title: Stalker

text: and return to our God-forsakentown a genius.
title: Stalker

text: A man writes because he's tormented,because he doubts.
title: Stalker

text: He needs to constantly proveto himself and to the others
title: Stalker

text: that he's worth something.
title: Stalker

text: And if I know for surethat I'm a genius?
title: Stalker

text: Why write then?
title: Stalker

text: What the hell for?
title: Stalker

text: Well, I must say
title: Stalker

text: that we exist for...
title: Stalker

text: Will you be so kindand leave me alone?
title: Stalker

text: Let me get a wink,I haven't slept all night.
title: Stalker

text: Keep your complexes to yourself.
title: Stalker

text: In any case,all this technology of yours...
title: Stalker

text: all those blast furnaces, wheels...
title: Stalker

text: and other bullshit
title: Stalker

text: are only designed in orderto work less and eat more.
title: Stalker

text: They are all just crutches,artificial limbs.
title: Stalker

text: And mankind existsin order to create...
title: Stalker

text: works of art.
title: Stalker

text: Unlike all other human activities,this one is unselfish.
title: Stalker

text: Great illusions!Images of the absolute truth!
title: Stalker

text: Are you listening to me, Professor?
title: Stalker

text: What unselfishnessare you talking about?
title: Stalker

text: People still die of hunger.Have you fallen from the moon?
title: Stalker

text: And they are considered to beour brainy aristocracy!
title: Stalker

text: You're not even capable of thinkingin abstractions.
title: Stalker

text: Are you going to teach meabout the meaning of life?
title: Stalker

text: And also how to think?
title: Stalker

text: It's useless. You might bea professor, but an ignorant one.
title: Stalker
